comment: можно подслушать отчет возле какого-нибудь когитатора

languages.text: "...зафиксировано 98 нарушений в циклах работы дверных проемов на нижних и средних палубах".

traits.locale_text: {n}В динамиках вокс-устройства механический голос зачитывает отчет.{/n} "...зафиксировано 98 нарушений в циклах работы дверных проемов на нижних и средних палубах".

languages.text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
languages.original_text: "...зафиксировано 98 нарушений в циклах работы дверных проемов на нижних и средних палубах".

traits.locale_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
"...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
"...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
"...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
"...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."
"...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

languages.text: « ... enregistrements indiquent un total de 98 irrégularités lors de cycles opérationnels des portes effectués sur les ponts inférieurs et intermédiaires. »
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: « ... enregistrements indiquent un total de 98 irrégularités lors de cycles opérationnels des portes effectués sur les ponts inférieurs et intermédiaires. »

languages.text: “……记录显示，在下层和中层舱门的操作周期中，一共发生了98次违规。”
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: “……记录显示，在下层和中层舱门的操作周期中，一共发生了98次违规。”

languages.text: "... Unterlagen zeigen insgesamt 98 Unregelmäßigkeiten in den Betriebszyklen von Türen auf den Unter- und Mitteldecks."
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: "... Unterlagen zeigen insgesamt 98 Unregelmäßigkeiten in den Betriebszyklen von Türen auf den Unter- und Mitteldecks."

languages.text: «... los registros indican un total de 98 irregularidades en los ciclos de operación de las puertas de las cubiertas inferior y central».
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: «... los registros indican un total de 98 irregularidades en los ciclos de operación de las puertas de las cubiertas inferior y central».

languages.text: 「…記録によると、下層デッキと中層デッキの出入り口の作動サイクル中に合計98回確認できました」
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: 「…記録によると、下層デッキと中層デッキの出入り口の作動サイクル中に合計98回確認できました」

languages.text: "Aşağı ve orta güvertelerdeki kapı faaliyet döngülerinde toplam 98 olağan dışı durum kayıtlanmış."
languages.original_text: "...records show a total of 98 irregularities in the operation cycles of doorways on the lower and middle decks."

traits.locale_text: "Kayıtlarda, aşağı ve orta güvertelerdeki kapı faaliyet döngülerinde toplam 98 olağan dışı durum gösteriliyor."
